column1: 7321,Delivery Drivers,,"Follow safety procedures for vehicle operation
column5: Manoeuvre vehicles into position for loading and unloading
column7: Follow safety procedures for loading and unloading vehicles
column9: Record details of deliveries or shipments
column19: Collect fares or payment from customers
column21: Receive information or instructions for performing work assignments
column27: Notify others of emergencies, problems or hazards
column33: Maintain vehicles in good working condition
